Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= practices that conform to the laws of God
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= action by which humans take property unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force
= the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal
= action by which the skin is removed from an animal

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= a container ◄ made of iron or ceramics; ► used for boiling food; ≈ associated with steam
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: to bite; hence: = to ingest food
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: to convoke (a holy event)|to declare (a holy event)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans call their community together for an event with a religious character, such as worship, fasting, or a holy war
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= experience by which humans see something in a dream or trance, or as a supernatural apparition

= process by which the light gradually disappears, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars can no longer reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, death, and lack of enlightenment

= action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= someone who receives divine messages, primarily by means of visions
= process by which humans experience a strong emotion of shame

= action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king
= causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else
= body hair growing above the upper lip

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= marker indicating that the information that follows is in contrast with what has preceded
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= practices that conform to the laws of God
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= a person who is acknowledged by a group as having authority over them ► to provide leadership, often in battle, and justice
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= practices that conform to the laws of God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which an event is morally and ethically right
literally: to make (an event) crooked; hence: = causative action by which humans change something that is right into wrong
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= the state of being or acting in an unjust or morally evil way
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= an object, usually of some value, given to a person; ► can be given without any expectation of exchange or often with the purpose to influence or persuade another person
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= the amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

= action by which humans communicate with the spirit world using a variety of means such as inspecting the liver of animals, shaking arrows, consulting teraphim, or casting lots; ≈ usually regarded as an evil practice that is to be condemned; responsibility of a prophet or king
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

Node.gloss: because of|for the sake of|on account of
Node.definition: = particle linking two propositions, by which Y represents the reason or cause for X
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
= causative action by which someone completely destroys an object so that it will not be seen anymore, ◄ in the same way as weeds are plowed under and disappear from view when the soil is turned up
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= heap of stones ◄ remaining after the total destruction of a town; ≈ associated with hardship and poverty
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: the back (of an area); hence: = the highest situated parts of a certain location, often representing the entire location
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals
